answers.answer: This may be pvc's, which are actually double beats, not missed beats, although they feel like you have skipped a beat and then there will be a big "thump" when it "starts" again.   I heard that there are some vitamins that might help this (magnesium maybe, not really sure), but you may want to consult a cardiologist to rule out any other problems first.Good luck and best wishes
